II.iii.1.A.4.g
.
Furnishing Applications to Claimants
VA has an obligation under
38 CFR 3.150
to provide an application for benefits to anyone who requests one.
Before furnishing an application to a claimant
in person
, enter the Veteran’s name and file number in the appropriate spaces on the form.
Rationale
:  When the claimant eventually returns the application to VA, it will be easier and faster to
identify the Veteran on whom the claim is based, and
associate the application with the proper claims folder.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - Applications for Benefits
